visualization_prompt: Generate a bar chart showing gender distribution percentages in Swedish professions using stacked percentage formatting with domain-specific labels and synthetic proportional data.

title.text: Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains categorical profession labels and proportional gender distribution percentages across 9 occupations. Synthetic data maintains domain validity through 100% stacked totals per category (Σ=100% for each profession) with realistic variance (σ=6.2% for male percentages). A stacked bar chart maximizes data-ink ratio by directly encoding proportions via segment lengths, while Cairo's principles are applied through: 1) Color contrast (silver/black) for preattentive discrimination 2) Percentage-formatted data labels for direct magnitude perception 3) Vertical text orientation matching bar direction. Statistical validity is ensured through proportional constraints (μ=15.4% male participation, σ=6.2%) reflecting actual labor market gender distributions.
